name: Marketstack Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Marketstack Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Marketstack API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Marketstack API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: endOfDayData | (必填项)
available_options: End-of-Day Data (值: endOfDayData) - Stock market closing data

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

symbols.name: symbols
symbols.description: One or multiple comma-separated stock symbols (tickers) to retrieve, e.g. `AAPL` or `AAPL,MSFT`
symbols.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticker | 作用: One or multiple comma-separated stock symbols (tickers) to retrieve, e.g. `AAPL` or `AAPL,MSFT` | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: exchange (值: None) - Stock exchange to filter results by, specified by Market Identifier Code, e.g. `XNAS`
latest (值: None) - Whether to fetch the most recent stock market data
sort (值: None) - Order to sort results in
specificDate (值: None) - Date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. `2020-01-01`, or in ISO-8601 date format, e.g. `2020-05-21T00:00:00+0000`
dateFrom (值: None) - Timeframe start date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. `2020-01-01`, or in ISO-8601 date format, e.g. `2020-05-21T00:00:00+0000`
dateTo (值: None) - Timeframe end date in YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. `2020-01-01`, or in ISO-8601 date format, e.g. `2020-05-21T00:00:00+0000`

exchange.name: exchange
exchange.description: Stock exchange to retrieve, specified by Market Identifier Code, e.g. `XNAS`
exchange.natural_language_description: 参数名: Exchange | 作用: Stock exchange to retrieve, specified by Market Identifier Code, e.g. `XNAS` | (必填项)

symbol.name: symbol
symbol.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticker | 作用: Stock symbol (ticker) to retrieve, e.g. `AAPL` | (必填项)
